title: Divesheet.com
description: A dive sheet generator for a 6 or 11 dive meet. Deployed Client in React with Next.js on Netlify.
details: The Divesheet.com app that allows user to create a list of dives for a dive meet to save and print. It is a utility with a tour guide, and stepper functionality.

title: Cloud Copy 'n Paste
description: A Full-Stack App, Deployed Client in React and Next.js, Deployed Apollo GraphQL Server in Node.js.
details: Cloud based Copy and Paste app that allows user to create a URL with pasted text & open said URL on another device to retrieve the text.

title: Pantry Chef
description: A Full-Stack App in React that outputs recipes based on a logged in user's ingredients.
details: A Full-Stack App in React that outputs recipes based on a logged in user's ingredients.

title: Loma Linda Neighborhood
description: A community site for the Loma Linda Neighborhood Association.
